mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_CLASS ( F_CLASS_ID, F_OWNER_PROJECT_ID, F_CLASS_NAME, F_TITLE, F_DESCRIPTION, F_NOTE ) VALUES ( #{classId}, #{ownerProjectId}, #{className}, #{title}, #{description}, #{note} )
mapper.select: SELECT F_CLASS_ID AS "classId", F_OWNER_PROJECT_ID AS "ownerProjectId", F_CLASS_NAME AS "className", F_TITLE AS "title", F_DESCRIPTION AS "description", F_NOTE AS "note" FROM T_CLASS WHERE F_CLASS_ID = #{classId}

SELECT F_FIELD_ID AS "fieldId", F_OWNER_CLASS_ID AS "ownerClassId", F_FIELD_NAME AS "fieldName", F_TYPE AS "type", F_WIDTH AS "width", F_SCALE AS "scale", F_CREF_CLASS_ID AS "crefClassId", F_EREF_ENUM_ID AS "erefEnumId", F_FREF_FIELD_ID AS "frefFieldId", F_PK AS "pk", F_TITLE AS "title", F_DESCRIPTION AS "description", F_NOTE AS "note" FROM T_FIELD WHERE F_OWNER_CLASS_ID = #{c.classId} AND F_PK = 1
